Package xxl.core.comparators

Provides some useful additional Comparators based on Comparator.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComparableComparator<T extends Comparable<T>>
    The ComparableComparator uses the compareTo method of a given Comparable object to compare two elements.
    Comparators
    This class provides some useful static methods for dealing with comparators.
    CountingComparator<T>  
    DecoratorComparator<T>  
    DistanceBasedComparator<T>
    The DistanceBasedComparator compares two objects by determining their distances to a given reference object.
    EmbeddingComparator<T>
    The EmbeddingComparator adds a bound to a given comparator.
    FeatureComparator<S,T>
    The FeatureComparator compares the 'feature's of two given objects.
    InverseComparator<T>
    The InverseComparator inverts the ordering of a given Comparator.
    LexicographicalComparator<T>
    The LexicographicalComparator creates a lexicographical ordering.

Package xxl.core.comparators Description

Provides some useful additional Comparators based on Comparator.
